organisation_name: Sector Skills Alliance for Advanced Manufacturing (skillman.eu)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
cumulusassociation.org 
 
Cumulus is composed by more than 250 members, universities, training providers and other organisations, from 54 countries worldwide, and is currently the only global association to serve design education and research, addressed to the transfer of knowledge and best practices
goals__remit:
Skillman is the European Sector Skills Alliance addressed to introduce skills, competences and innovative curricula for the advanced manufacturing sector within the VET pathways. The alliance  connects industry and training providers with civil society and gives support services that drive growth and effectiveness for its  members. 
 
Skillman.eu is a Sector Skills Council EASC ’s affiliates launched in 2015 grown to more than 250 members at the end of 2017. The skillman partners own a European outreach and expertise and a deep competence in vocational skills anticipation in supply, training, and qualification design. 
 
The approach of the skillman.eu members is to combine a solid knowledge of skills needs and training practices with a well organised systemic and sector-related information system. 
 
The Alliance is joined by industry leaders, VET providers, universities and other networks that also represents other organisations worldwide. The partnership owns a large geographical coverage and is very well representative in the AM sector at national and international level.
